tool_description: Provides timing functionality for reading sessions with pause/resume capabilities and automatic progress tracking.

session_id.description: Unique identifier for the reading session

book_title.description: Title of the book being read

timer_action.description: Timer action: start, pause, resume, or stop

starting_page.description: Page number where reading session begins

error_messages: Invalid session_id: Session identifier cannot be empty
Invalid book_title: Book title cannot be empty
Invalid timer_action: Must be one of 'start', 'pause', 'resume', or 'stop'
Session not found: Cannot pause, resume, or stop a session that hasn't been started
Invalid starting_page: Must be a positive integer if provided
Invalid target_duration: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 480 minutes
usage: Start a session with session_id, book_title, and timer_action 'start'. Use 'pause', 'resume', or 'stop' actions with the same session_id to control timing. Optionally set starting_page and target_duration.

session_status.description: Current status of the session (running, paused, stopped, completed)

elapsed_minutes.description: Total minutes elapsed in the session

remaining_time.description: Minutes remaining if target_duration was set

session_start_time.description: Timestamp when the session was started

last_action_time.description: Timestamp of the most recent timer action
